00021 #pragma once

00023 #include <cusp/detail/config.h>
00024 
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <stdexcept>
00027 
00028 namespace cusp
00029 {
00030 
00031     class exception : public std::exception
00032     {
00033         public:
00034             exception(const exception& exception_) : message(exception_.message) {}
00035             exception(const std::string& message_) : message(message_) {}
00036             ~exception() throw() {}
00037             const char* what() const throw() { return message.c_str(); }
00038 
00039         protected:
00040             std::string message;
00041     };
00042     
00043     class not_implemented_exception : public exception
00044     {
00045         public:
00046             template <typename MessageType>
00047             not_implemented_exception(const MessageType& message) : exception(message) {}
00048     };
00049 
00050     class io_exception : public exception
00051     {
00052         public:
00053             template <typename MessageType>
00054             io_exception(const MessageType& message) : exception(message) {}
00055     };
00056 
00057     class invalid_input_exception : public exception
00058     {
00059         public:
00060             template <typename MessageType>
00061             invalid_input_exception(const MessageType& message) : exception(message) {}
00062     };
00063     
00064     class format_exception : public exception
00065     {
00066         public:
00067             template <typename MessageType>
00068             format_exception(const MessageType& message) : exception(message) {}
00069     };
00070 
00071     class format_conversion_exception : public format_exception
00072     {
00073         public:
00074             template <typename MessageType>
00075             format_conversion_exception(const MessageType& message) : format_exception(message) {}
00076     };
00077

00079     {
00080         public:
00081             template <typename MessageType>
